class.name: AudioListener1D
class.brief_description: Overrides the location sounds are heard from in 1D.
class.description: Once added to the scene tree, this node will override the location sounds are heard from. Only one [AudioListener1D] can be current. Setting [member current] to [code]true[/code] will disable the previous [AudioListener1D] (and disable any [AudioListener2D] nodes). This node will attempt to automatically set itself as current, but if there are multiple you will need to explicitly set one as current. If there is no active [AudioListener1D] in the current [Viewport], the center of the screen will be used as a hearing point for the audio. [AudioListener1D] needs to be inside the [SceneTree] to function.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], this [AudioListener1D] is the active audio listener.
